name: MaxiCompress Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .MXC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MaxiCompress is a utility that uses several different compression algorithms to compress files efficiently. After compressing one or more files, MaxiCompress places those files in an MXC archive.
Each MXC file contains a MaxiCompress-specific header. Among other things, this header specifies the type of compression MaxiCompress used to compress each archived file.

instructions: You can use MaxiCompress to decompress an MXC archive and extract the files it contains. For more information, visit MaxiCompress's GitHub page.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
